name: PIM_Lipid_Panel_CPTs
title: PIM_Lipid_Panel_CPTs
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Procedural codes for Lipid Panel lab test),(Data Element Scope: Identification of patients with a procedure code for Lipid Panel lab test),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

concept.display: Lipid panel results documented and reviewed (must include total cholesterol, HDL-C, triglycerides and calculated LDL-C) (CAD)
Lipid panel This panel must include the following: Cholesterol, serum, total (82465) Lipoprotein, direct measurement, high density cholesterol (HDL cholesterol) (83718) Triglycerides (84478)

contains.display: Lipid panel results documented and reviewed (must include total cholesterol, HDL-C, triglycerides and calculated LDL-C) (CAD)
Lipid panel This panel must include the following: Cholesterol, serum, total (82465) Lipoprotein, direct measurement, high density cholesterol (HDL cholesterol) (83718) Triglycerides (84478)
